<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">ffmpeg -i input.mp3 -ab 24k -ar 16k output.mp3</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p><code>-ab</code>: 等同于<code>-b:v</code>，设置码率
<code>-ar</code>: 设置音频采样速率</p>
<h3 id="查看音量" class="heading-element"><span>查看音量</span>
 <a href="#%e6%9f%a5%e7%9c%8b%e9%9f%b3%e9%87%8f" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-sh" data-lang="sh"><span class="line"><span class="cl">ffmpeg -i input.mp4 -af volumedetect -f null -</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>上述命令的运行结果的其中两行信息如下，分别表示平均音量和最大音量</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-fallback" data-lang="fallback"><span class="line"><span class="cl">[Parsed_volumedetect_0 @ 0x6000025e9b80] mean_volume: -38.7 dB
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">[Parsed_volumedetect_0 @ 0x6000025e9b80] max_volume: -10.1 dB</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h3 id="调整音量" class="heading-element"><span>调整音量</span>
 <a href="#%e8%b0%83%e6%95%b4%e9%9f%b3%e9%87%8f" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span><span class="lnt">6
</span><span class="lnt">7
</span><span class="lnt">8
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-sh" data-lang="sh"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 音量调大10分贝</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">ffmpeg -i input.mp4 -c:v copy -af <span class="s2">&#34;volume=10dB&#34;</span> output.mp4
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 音量调小5分贝</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">ffmpeg -i input.mp4 -c:v copy -af <span class="s2">&#34;volume=-5dB&#34;</span> output.mp4
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 音量调为150%</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">ffmpeg -i input.mp4 -c:v copy -af <span class="s2">&#34;volume=1.5&#34;</span> output.mp4
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 音量调为80%</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">ffmpeg -i input.mp4 -c:v copy -af <span class="s2">&#34;volume=0.8&#34;</span> output.mp4</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h3 id="绘制音量波形图" class="heading-element"><span>绘制音量波形图</span>
 <a href="#%e7%bb%98%e5%88%b6%e9%9f%b3%e9%87%8f%e6%b3%a2%e5%bd%a2%e5%9b%be" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p><a href="https://ffmpeg.org/ffmpeg-filters.html#showwavespic"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">https://ffmpeg.org/ffmpeg-filters.html#showwavespic</a></p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">ffmpeg -i input.mp4 -filter_complex <span class="s2">&#34;showwavespic=s=600x240:scale=3&#34;</span> -vframes <span class="m">1</span> output.png</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p><code>s</code>: 指定图片大小，默认是<code>600x240</code>
<code>scale</code>: 设置音量振幅放缩比例，范围是<code>[0-3]</code></p>
<h2 id="ffprobe" class="heading-element"><span>ffprobe</span>
 <a href="#ffprobe" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><h3 id="简介-1" class="heading-element"><span>简介</span>
 <a href="#%e7%ae%80%e4%bb%8b-1" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>ffprobe 是ffmpeg的一个工具包，主要用于探测音视频文件的各种信息</p>
<p>参考：</p>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://ffmpeg.org/ffprobe.html"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">ffprobe Documentation-官网</a></li>
<li><a href="https://www.jianshu.com/p/789244ad10d8"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">ffprobe 使用小结-简书</a></li>
<li><a href="https://juejin.cn/post/6844903920750297101"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">FFmpeg之ffprobe-掘金</a></li>
<li><a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/chentiao/p/17085229.html"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">ffprobe输出元数据参数解析-博客园</a></li>
</ul>
<h3 id="参数介绍" class="heading-element"><span>参数介绍</span>
 <a href="#%e5%8f%82%e6%95%b0%e4%bb%8b%e7%bb%8d" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 下述两个命令等效，输出信息类似于: ffmpeg -i input.mp4</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">ffprobe input.mp4
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">ffprobe -i input.mp4</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h4 id="-show_format" class="heading-element"><span><code>-show_format</code></span>
 <a href="#-show_format" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h4><blockquote><p>查看容器格式相关信息</p>
</blockquote><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">ffprobe -show_format input.mp4</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h4 id="-show_streams" class="heading-element"><span><code>-show_streams</code></span>
 <a href="#-show_streams" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h4><blockquote><p>查看流信息</p>
</blockquote><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">ffprobe -show_streams input.mp4</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h4 id="-show_frames" class="heading-element"><span><code>-show_frames</code></span>
 <a href="#-show_frames" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h4><blockquote><p>查看帧信息</p>
</blockquote><h4 id="-show_entries" class="heading-element"><span><code>-show_entries</code></span>
 <a href="#-show_entries" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h4><blockquote><p>设置只输出指定条目</p>
</blockquote><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span><span class="lnt">6
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 只输出下述四项</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># -show_format中的bit_rate,duration</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># -show_streams中的codec_type,codec_name,bit_rate</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># -show_streams中的tags</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># -show_streams中的disposition中的attached_pic</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">ffprobe -v error -show_entries <span class="nv">format</span><span class="o">=</span>bit_rate,duration:stream<span class="o">=</span>codec_type,codec_name,bit_rate:stream_tags:stream_disposition<span class="o">=</span>attached_pic input.mp4</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h4 id="-output_format--of" class="heading-element"><span><code>-output_format, -of</code>:</span>
 <a href="#-output_format--of" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h4><blockquote><p>设置输出格式</p>
</blockquote><p>例如</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">ffprobe -v error -show_entries <span class="nv">format</span><span class="o">=</span>bit_rate,duration test.mp4</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>输出如下</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-fallback" data-lang="fallback"><span class="line"><span class="cl">[FORMAT]
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">duration=30.000181
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">bit_rate=13020820
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">[/FORMAT]</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>那么，下述命令及其输出如下</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">ffprobe -v error -show_entries <span class="nv">format</span><span class="o">=</span>bit_rate,duration -output_format <span class="nv">default</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="nv">noprint_wrappers</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="m">1</span> test.mp4</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-fallback" data-lang="fallback"><span class="line"><span class="cl">duration=30.000181
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">bit_rate=13020820</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">ffprobe -v error -show_entries <span class="nv">format</span><span class="o">=</span>bit_rate,duration -of <span class="nv">default</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="nv">nokey</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="m">1</span> test.mp4</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-fallback" data-lang="fallback"><span class="line"><span class="cl">[FORMAT]
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">30.000181
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">13020820
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">[/FORMAT]</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>同时设置<code>nokey</code>和<code>noprint_wrappers</code>的命令如下</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">ffprobe -v error -show_entries <span class="nv">format</span><span class="o">=</span>bit_rate,duration -of <span class="nv">default</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="nv">nokey</span><span class="o">=</span>1:noprint_wrappers<span class="o">=</span><span class="m">1</span> test.mp4</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>等价于下述命令，<code>nokey</code>简写<code>nk</code>，<code>noprint_wrappers</code>简写<code>nw</code></p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">ffprobe -v error -show_entries <span class="nv">format</span><span class="o">=</span>bit_rate,duration -of <span class="nv">default</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="nv">nk</span><span class="o">=</span>1:nw<span class="o">=</span><span class="m">1</span> test.mp4</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>亦可指定输出格式，以json格式输出的命令如下</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">ffprobe -v error -show_entries <span class="nv">format</span><span class="o">=</span>bit_rate,duration -of json test.mp4</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h4 id="-select_streams" class="heading-element"><span><code>-select_streams</code></span>
 <a href="#-select_streams" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h4><blockquote><p>输出指定流的信息</p>
</blockquote><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt"> 1
</span><span class="lnt"> 2
</span><span class="lnt"> 3
</span><span class="lnt"> 4
</span><span class="lnt"> 5
</span><span class="lnt"> 6
</span><span class="lnt"> 7
</span><span class="lnt"> 8
</span><span class="lnt"> 9
</span><span class="lnt">10
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 音频流</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">ffprobe -v error -show_streams -select_streams a test.mp4
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 视频流</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">ffprobe -v error -show_streams -select_streams v test.mp4
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 第一个视频流</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">ffprobe -v error -show_streams -select_streams v:0 test.mp4
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 第二个视频流</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">ffprobe -v error -show_streams -select_streams v:1 test.mp4
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 第二个流</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">ffprobe -v error -show_streams -select_streams <span class="m">1</span> test.mp4</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h4 id="-count_frames" class="heading-element"><span><code>-count_frames</code></span>
 <a href="#-count_frames" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h4><blockquote><p>计算每个流的帧数，并在相应的流部分中报告</p>
</blockquote><p>例如，视频总帧数命令如下</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">ffprobe -v error -count_frames -select_streams v:0 -show_entries <span class="nv">stream</span><span class="o">=</span>nb_read_frames test.mp4</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>不指定参数<code>-select_streams</code>时，<code>nb_read_frames</code>是<code>N/A</code></p>
<h2 id="小结" class="heading-element"><span>小结</span>
 <a href="#%e5%b0%8f%e7%bb%93" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><h3 id="压缩视频" class="heading-element"><span>压缩视频</span>
 <a href="#%e5%8e%8b%e7%bc%a9%e8%a7%86%e9%a2%91" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><ul>
<li>降低分辨率</li>
<li>降低帧率</li>
<li>用crf参数进行压缩</li>
<li>非H264的视频，可考虑改成H264，H264压缩可能比原编解码器更高</li>
<li>更改H264格式视频的profile，从压缩比例来说，baseline&lt;main&lt;high</li>
<li>使用H265编码，比H264压缩效率更高，但需要考虑兼容性，H264兼容性更高</li>
</ul>

item.title: Mac Notes
item.author: 1469025384@qq.com (Hu Xin)
item.description:
<h2 id="tips" class="heading-element"><span>Tips</span>
 <a href="#tips" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><h3 id="homebrew" class="heading-element"><span>Homebrew</span>
 <a href="#homebrew" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>brew是mac系统中程序包的管理程序，通过brew安装的程序默认都是<code>/opt/homebrew/Cellar</code>下，然后在<code>/opt/homebrew/bin</code>下创建对应的软链接来使用的。用官网的命令安装失败，可参见清华源官网安装方法。</p>
<p>Homebrew/Linuxbrew 镜像使用帮助：<a href="https://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/help/homebrew/"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">https://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/help/homebrew/</a></p>
<p>Homebrew-bottles 镜像使用帮助：<a href="https://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/help/homebrew-bottles/"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">https://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/help/homebrew-bottles/</a></p>
<p>临时使用: <code>export HOMEBREW_BOTTLE_DOMAIN=https://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/homebrew-bottles</code></p>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>常用命令</th>
<th></th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>brew update</td>
<td></td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>brew install packageName1 packageName2</td>
<td></td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>brew uninstall packageName</td>
<td></td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>brew remove packageName</td>
<td></td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>brew list</td>
<td></td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>brew info packageName</td>
<td></td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>brew search packageName</td>
<td></td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>brew outdated</td>
<td>查看可升级的包</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>brew upgrade packageName</td>
<td>升级某一个包，后面不接包名则升级所有包</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>brew cleanup -n</td>
<td>查看可清除的软件和可升级的软件</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>brew cleanup</td>
<td>清除所有老版本的软件及一些无用软链接等</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>brew link packageName</td>
<td>给对应软件创建软链接</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>brew leaves</td>
<td>列出所有没有依赖其他包的已安装软件包</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>brew deps packageName</td>
<td>查看该包所依赖的包，可选参数&ndash;tree</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>brew uses &ndash;installed packageName</td>
<td>查看该包被哪些已安装的包所依赖</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<p>Homebrew相关命令：<a href="https://www.jianshu.com/p/3016f1897e31"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">Mac软件包管理神器Homebrew</a></p>
<p>brew-cask：
<a href="https://github.com/Homebrew/homebrew-cask"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">https://github.com/Homebrew/homebrew-cask</a>
<a href="https://github.com/buo/homebrew-cask-upgrade"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">https://github.com/buo/homebrew-cask-upgrade</a></p>
<h3 id="软件数据缓存路径" class="heading-element"><span>软件数据缓存路径</span>
 <a href="#%e8%bd%af%e4%bb%b6%e6%95%b0%e6%8d%ae%e7%bc%93%e5%ad%98%e8%b7%af%e5%be%84" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span><span class="lnt">6
</span><span class="lnt">7
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-fallback" data-lang="fallback"><span class="line"><span class="cl">~/Library/Containers
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">~/Library/Application Support
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">/Library/Application Support
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">~/Library/LaunchAgents
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">/Library/LaunchAgents
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">/Library/StartupItems
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">~/Library/Caches</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>微信文件缓存路径：<code>/Users/star/Library/Containers/com.tencent.xinWeChat/Data/Library/Application Support/com.tencent.xinWeChat/2.0b4.0.9/8734c5845659e8690499560d9ae8b641/Message/MessageTemp</code></p>
<h3 id="启动台" class="heading-element"><span>启动台</span>
 <a href="#%e5%90%af%e5%8a%a8%e5%8f%b0" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><h4 id="已安装应用启动台不显示" class="heading-element"><span>已安装应用启动台不显示</span>
 <a href="#%e5%b7%b2%e5%ae%89%e8%a3%85%e5%ba%94%e7%94%a8%e5%90%af%e5%8a%a8%e5%8f%b0%e4%b8%8d%e6%98%be%e7%a4%ba" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h4><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-sh" data-lang="sh"><span class="line"><span class="cl">defaults write com.apple.dock ResetLaunchPad -bool true<span class="p">;</span> killall Dock</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>这将回到MacOS应用图标默认布局，比如原来归类好的图标整理，执行后，会全部打乱，但是之前不出现的APP应用，现在可以显示了。</p>
<h4 id="启动台有残留图标" class="heading-element"><span>启动台有残留图标</span>
 <a href="#%e5%90%af%e5%8a%a8%e5%8f%b0%e6%9c%89%e6%ae%8b%e7%95%99%e5%9b%be%e6%a0%87" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h4><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-sh" data-lang="sh"><span class="line"><span class="cl">defaults write com.apple.dock ResetLasunchPad -bool true<span class="p">;</span> killall Dock</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>应用程序卸载后，启动台中仍有残留图标，无法移动到废纸篓，可使用该命令。</p>
<h4 id="重置启动台" class="heading-element"><span>重置启动台</span>
 <a href="#%e9%87%8d%e7%bd%ae%e5%90%af%e5%8a%a8%e5%8f%b0" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h4><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">defaults delete com.apple.dock<span class="p">;</span> killall Dock</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>此命令也会重置触发角</p>
<h3 id="环境变量" class="heading-element"><span>环境变量</span>
 <a href="#%e7%8e%af%e5%a2%83%e5%8f%98%e9%87%8f" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><h4 id="shell类型" class="heading-element"><span>shell类型</span>
 <a href="#shell%e7%b1%bb%e5%9e%8b" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h4><ul>
<li>交互式Shell：用户通过终端与Shell直接交互，输入命令并立即获得反馈。</li>
<li>非交互式Shell：Shell在没有用户直接交互的情况下运行，通常用于脚本执行。比如通过<code>sh</code>命令执行脚本</li>
<li>登录Shell，当用户通过终端或远程连接（如 SSH）登录系统时启动的Shell。终端新建标签页也是一个新的登录shell</li>
<li>非登录式Shell：在用户已经登录系统后，通过终端或图形界面启动的Shell。比如在当前终端窗口通过<code>zsh</code>等命令打开的终端</li>
</ul>
<h4 id="终端配置文件" class="heading-element"><span>终端配置文件</span>
 <a href="#%e7%bb%88%e7%ab%af%e9%85%8d%e7%bd%ae%e6%96%87%e4%bb%b6" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h4><ul>
<li><code>/etc/zprofile</code>：系统范围的登录shell设置，仅在登录shell会话中加载。</li>
<li><code>/etc/zshrc</code>：系统范围的交互式shell设置，对所有用户的交互式shell会话都有效。</li>
<li><code>~/.zprofile</code>：用户级登录shell设置，当前用户每次启动一个新的登录shell时加载。</li>
<li><code>~/.zshrc</code>：用户级交互式shell设置，当前用户每次启动一个新的交互式shell时加载。</li>
</ul>
<p>通常只对<code>~/.zprofile</code>和<code>~/.zshrc</code>做些修改，当打开一个登录交互式shell（比如新的终端窗口或标签页），先加载<code>~/.zprofile</code>后加载<code>~/.zshrc</code>。同一环境变量，被多次设置，以最后一次设置的值为准。</p>
<div class="alert alert-important"><p class="alert-title"><svg class="icon" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 16 16" width="16" height="16"><path d="M0 1.75C0 .784.784.0 1.75.0h12.5C15.216.0 16 .784 16 1.75v9.5A1.75 1.75.0 0114.25 13H8.06l-2.573 2.573A1.458 1.458.0 013 14.543V13H1.75A1.75 1.75.0 010 11.25zm1.75-.25a.25.25.0 00-.25.25v9.5c0 .138.112.25.25.25h2a.75.75.0 01.75.75v2.19l2.72-2.72a.749.749.0 01.53-.22h6.5a.25.25.0 00.25-.25v-9.5a.25.25.0 00-.25-.25zm7 2.25v2.5a.75.75.0 01-1.5.0v-2.5a.75.75.0 011.5.0zM9 9A1 1 0 117 9a1 1 0 012 0z"/></svg>Important</p><p><p>比如<code>~/.zprofile</code>文件中其中一行命令是<code>export PATH=&quot;/opt/homebrew/opt/llvm/bin:$PATH&quot;</code>，现在将这一行注释掉，不新建终端窗口而是运行<code>source ~/.zprofile</code>，效果是当前终端窗口把<code>~/.zprofile</code>中的命令在当前环境下再运行一遍，所以<code>PATH</code>变量中依旧在路径<code>/opt/homebrew/opt/llvm/bin</code>。所以此时应该新建窗口而不是运行<code>source</code>命令。</p>
</div><h4 id="常见环境变量" class="heading-element"><span>常见环境变量</span>
 <a href="#%e5%b8%b8%e8%a7%81%e7%8e%af%e5%a2%83%e5%8f%98%e9%87%8f" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h4><ul>
<li>
<p><code>PATH</code>：该变量指定了可执行文件的搜索路径。比如运行命令<code>make</code>，系统会依次从<code>PATH</code>变量指定的路径中搜索可执行文件<code>make</code>，直到找到第一个名为<code>make</code>的可执行文件。现安装了新版本的<code>make</code>，路径是<code>/opt/homebrew/opt/make/libexec/gnubin</code>，可在终端配置文件（如zsh的<code>~/.zprofile</code>）添加<code>export PATH=&quot;/opt/homebrew/opt/make/libexec/gnubin:$PATH&quot;</code>，也就是将该路径放到原<code>PATH</code>变量的前面，这样之后运行<code>make</code>命令是自己安装的新版本的<code>make</code>。</p>
<p>通常运行完<code>brew install</code>命令或者运行<code>brew info</code>命令，在输出结果中有时可以看到有提示需要某些路径添加到<code>PATH</code>变量中。也有些软件会自动在<code>PATH</code>中的某个路径中创建相关可执行文件的软链接，不需要再修改<code>PATH</code>变量了。</p>
</li>
</ul>
<h3 id="创建unix可执行文件" class="heading-element"><span>创建Unix可执行文件</span>
 <a href="#%e5%88%9b%e5%bb%baunix%e5%8f%af%e6%89%a7%e8%a1%8c%e6%96%87%e4%bb%b6" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>如创建一个无后缀文件<code>~/my-test</code>，在终端执行完命令<code>sudo chmod u+x ~/my-test</code>后，<code>my-test</code>文件就变成了Unix可执行文件类型（可用文本编辑器进行编辑）。</p>
<p>若在命令行运行<code>my-test</code>命令，需带上<code>my-test</code>命令的文件路径；即使<code>my-test</code>在当前文件夹下，直接执行命令my-test也没有用。</p>
<blockquote><p>test是shell内置命令，测试自己创建的Unix文件时，最好不要用test来命名</p>
</blockquote><p>为了可以直接在终端执行命令<code>my-test</code>，可以将<code>my-test</code>放到<code>/usr/local/bin</code>等文件夹下；当然，可以创建一个文件夹专门来存放自定义的Unix可执行文件，如<code>~/diy_bin</code>，那么只需在文件<code>~/.zprofile</code>里添加一行<code>export PATH=~/diy_bin:$PATH</code>，所有自定义的命令就可以直接在命令行使用了</p>
<h4 id="实例自定义以实现快捷激活python虚拟环境" class="heading-element"><span>实例：自定义以实现快捷激活Python虚拟环境</span>
 <a href="#%e5%ae%9e%e4%be%8b%e8%87%aa%e5%ae%9a%e4%b9%89%e4%bb%a5%e5%ae%9e%e7%8e%b0%e5%bf%ab%e6%8d%b7%e6%bf%80%e6%b4%bbpython%e8%99%9a%e6%8b%9f%e7%8e%af%e5%a2%83" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h4><p>Python使用虚拟环境见<a href="#1.1.2-%e4%bd%bf%e7%94%a8%e8%99%9a%e6%8b%9f%e7%8e%af%e5%a2%83">使用虚拟环境</a></p>
<p>方便起见，可以将所有创建的Python虚拟环境放在文件夹<code>~/.venv</code>下，那么激活名称为<code>venv-name</code>的虚拟环境的命令就是<code>source ~/.venv/venv-name/bin/activate</code>，该命令稍显复杂，下面用更简洁的命令实现激活虚拟环境</p>
<p>创建一个无后缀文件，并不需要，如起名为<code>activate-venv</code>，写入以下内容：</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nb">source</span> ~/.venv/<span class="si">${</span><span class="nv">1</span><span class="si">}</span>/bin/activate</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>此后，需要激活名称为<code>venv-name</code>的虚拟环境执行命令<code>source activate-venv venv-name</code>就可以。（当然，如果<code>activate-venv</code>文件不在当前文件夹目录下，将命令中的<code>activate-venv</code>改成其文件路径即可，例<code>source ~/activate-venv venv-name</code>）</p>
<p><strong>附加说明：</strong></p>
<p>一个最直接的想法是执行命令<code>sudo chmod u+x ~/activate-venv</code>，将其变成Unix可执行文件类型，那么在命令行执行命令<code>activate-venv venv-name</code>就可以激活对应的虚拟环境。</p>
<p>但是实际发现操作发现这样并不能达到预期的效果，原因大致可描述为：执行命令<code>activate-venv venv-name</code>后，系统相当于是后台创建了一个新的命令行窗口，在该命令行窗口执行完<code>activate-venv venv-name</code>所有内容后，将该窗口关闭，所以当前我们所在的窗口看不到命令执行的效果。</p>
<p>可以创建一个Unix可执行文件my-test，写入以下内容：</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nb">cd</span> ~/Python
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">open .
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nb">echo</span> <span class="sb">`</span><span class="nb">pwd</span><span class="sb">`</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>在终端执行命令<code>my-test</code>，会发现<code>~/Python</code>文件夹在访达中被打开，终端输出了<code>/Users/star/Python</code>，但是终端的文件路径并没有切换到<code>~/Python</code>；所以其实相当于是系统在后台新建的一个窗口里执行了命令<code>my-test</code>，只是把一些打印信息和一些实际性的操作（如open）呈现给用户。</p>
<p>所以执行命令<code>activate-venv venv-name</code>相当于系统在后台一个窗口激活了<code>venv-name</code>虚拟环境，命令执行完后关闭了，用户所在的命令行里也就看不到<code>venv-name</code>被激活。</p>
<p>因此，可以采用<code>source self-defined-command parameters</code>的方式来实现预期的效果</p>
<p>参考：<a href="https://segmentfault.com/a/1190000025190817"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">Bash技巧：一个在不同目录之间直接来回快速 cd 的Shell脚本</a></p>
<h3 id="url文件" class="heading-element"><span>url文件</span>
 <a href="#url%e6%96%87%e4%bb%b6" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>创建一个后缀为<code>.url</code>的文本文件，写入以下内容：</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-fallback" data-lang="fallback"><span class="line"><span class="cl">[InternetShortcut]
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">URL=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/URL</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><div class="alert alert-caution"><p class="alert-title"><svg class="icon" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 16 16" width="16" height="16"><path d="M4.47.22A.749.749.0 015 0h6c.199.0.389.079.53.22l4.25 4.25c.141.14.22.331.22.53v6a.749.749.0 01-.22.53l-4.25 4.25A.749.749.0 0111 16H5a.749.749.0 01-.53-.22L.22 11.53A.749.749.0 010 11V5c0-.199.079-.389.22-.53zm.84 1.28L1.5 5.31v5.38l3.81 3.81h5.38l3.81-3.81V5.31L10.69 1.5zM8 4a.75.75.0 01.75.75v3.5a.75.75.0 01-1.5.0v-3.5A.75.75.0 018 4zm0 8a1 1 0 110-2 1 1 0 010 2z"/></svg>Caution</p><p><p>在命令行<code>open -e file.url</code>命令可以用文本编辑器打开<code>url</code>文件，但是比如<code>url</code>文件中的内容如下</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-fallback" data-lang="fallback"><span class="line"><span class="cl">[InternetShortcut]
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">URL=</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>此时用<code>open</code>命令打开<code>url</code>文件会报错</p>
</div><h3 id="librsvg" class="heading-element"><span>librsvg</span>
 <a href="#librsvg" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">brew install librsvg
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">rsvg-convert in.svg --page-height <span class="m">512</span> --page-width <span class="m">512</span> -h <span class="m">512</span> --left <span class="m">45</span> -b white -o out.png
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">rsvg-convert in.svg -f pdf -o out.pdf</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h3 id="icns" class="heading-element"><span>icns</span>
 <a href="#icns" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>在访达中选择一个应用，右键<code>显示包内容</code>，进入<code>Contents/Resources/</code>文件夹，即可看到该软件相关的<code>icns</code>文件。用<code>预览</code>打开<code>icns</code>文件，可导出成<code>png</code>等格式。下面是制作<code>icns</code>文件的过程</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt"> 1
</span><span class="lnt"> 2
</span><span class="lnt"> 3
</span><span class="lnt"> 4
</span><span class="lnt"> 5
</span><span class="lnt"> 6
</span><span class="lnt"> 7
</span><span class="lnt"> 8
</span><span class="lnt"> 9
</span><span class="lnt">10
</span><span class="lnt">11
</span><span class="lnt">12
</span><span class="lnt">13
</span><span class="lnt">14
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">sips -z <span class="m">16</span> <span class="m">16</span> icns.png --out temp.iconset/icon_16x16.png
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">sips -z <span class="m">32</span> <span class="m">32</span> icns.png --out temp.iconset/icon_32x32.png
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">sips -z <span class="m">128</span> <span class="m">128</span> icns.png --out temp.iconset/icon_128x128.png
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">sips -z <span class="m">256</span> <span class="m">256</span> icns.png --out temp.iconset/icon_256x256.png
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">sips -z <span class="m">512</span> <span class="m">512</span> icns.png --out temp.iconset/icon_512x512.png
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">sips -z <span class="m">32</span> <span class="m">32</span> icns.png --out temp.iconset/icon_16x16@2x.png
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">sips -z <span class="m">64</span> <span class="m">64</span> icns.png --out temp.iconset/icon_32x32@2x.png
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">sips -z <span class="m">256</span> <span class="m">256</span> icns.png --out temp.iconset/icon_128x128@2x.png
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">sips -z <span class="m">512</span> <span class="m">512</span> icns.png --out temp.iconset/icon_256x256@2x.png
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">sips -z <span class="m">1024</span> <span class="m">1024</span> icns.png --out temp.iconset/icon_512x512@2x.png
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">iconutil -c icns temp.iconset -o icns.icns</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><ul>
<li>文件夹必须带<code>.iconset</code>后缀，文件夹下的文件名也必须是<code>icon</code>，文件夹必须在执行命令前创建好</li>
<li>关闭该应用，将应用从原文件夹中移出再打开，然后移回原文件夹后在打开，最后重启“访达”即可</li>
</ul>
<p><a href="https://www.macappbox.com/a/400.html"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">https://www.macappbox.com/a/400.html</a></p>
<p><a href="https://stackoverflow.com/questions/31632304/iconseterror-failed-to-generate-icns"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">https://stackoverflow.com/questions/31632304/iconseterror-failed-to-generate-icns</a></p>
<h3 id="推出u盘" class="heading-element"><span>推出U盘</span>
 <a href="#%e6%8e%a8%e5%87%bau%e7%9b%98" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><blockquote><p>磁盘“SanDisk”没有被推出，因为一个或多个程序可能正在使用它。</p>
</blockquote><p><a href="https://support.apple.com/zh-cn/guide/mac-help/mchlp1285/mac"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">官方方法</a>：退出登录、关机。时间成本更高，可先尝试下述方法。</p>
<p>解决步骤：先确定使用该磁盘的进程，退出该进程再尝试推出U盘</p>
<p>方法一：使用命令<code>lsof</code>，如下，可看到使用U盘的进程的PID</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">star@MacBookAir: ~/Downloads/Movies/temp $ lsof /Volumes/SanDisk 
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">COMMAND PID USER FD TYPE DEVICE SIZE/OFF NODE NAME
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">QuickLook <span class="m">632</span> star 3r REG 1,21 <span class="m">904373191</span> <span class="m">280781</span> /Volumes/SanDisk/Movies/test.mp4</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>方法二：先使用<code>df -lh</code>查看U盘的盘符，再使用<code>diskutil umount</code>推出U盘即可看到正在使用该U盘的进程的PID</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">star@MacBookAir: ~/Downloads/Movies/temp $ df -lh
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">Filesystem Size Used Avail Capacity iused ifree %iused Mounted on
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">...
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">/dev/disk4s1 117Gi 113Gi 3.6Gi 97% <span class="m">1</span> <span class="m">0</span> 100% /Volumes/SanDisk</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">star@MacBookAir: ~/Downloads/Movies/temp $ diskutil umount /dev/disk4s1 
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">Volume SanDisk on disk4s1 failed to unmount: dissented by PID <span class="m">632</span> <span class="o">(</span>/System/Library/Frameworks/QuickLookUI.framework/Versions/A/XPCServices/QuickLookUIService.xpc/Contents/MacOS/QuickLookUIService<span class="o">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">Dissenter parent PPID <span class="m">1</span> <span class="o">(</span>/sbin/launchd<span class="o">)</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>可能用上述两个方法并没有发现有进程使用U盘，那就重启电脑后再推出U盘。</p>
<h3 id="查看文件是否正在被使用" class="heading-element"><span>查看文件是否正在被使用</span>
 <a href="#%e6%9f%a5%e7%9c%8b%e6%96%87%e4%bb%b6%e6%98%af%e5%90%a6%e6%ad%a3%e5%9c%a8%e8%a2%ab%e4%bd%bf%e7%94%a8" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><div class="alert alert-note"><p class="alert-title"><svg class="icon" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 16 16" width="16" height="16"><path d="M0 8a8 8 0 1116 0A8 8 0 010 8zm8-6.5a6.5 6.5.0 100 13 6.5 6.5.0 000-13zM6.5 7.75A.75.75.0 017.25 7h1a.75.75.0 01.75.75v2.75h.25a.75.75.0 010 1.5h-2a.75.75.0 010-1.5h.25v-2h-.25a.75.75.0 01-.75-.75zM8 6a1 1 0 110-2 1 1 0 010 2z"/></svg>Note</p><p><p>该小节所说的文件是不仅仅指的是普通文件，也包括目录、套接字文件、字符设备、块设备等特殊文件，是一个更广泛的概念</p>
</div><h4 id="lsof和fuser" class="heading-element"><span>lsof和fuser</span>
 <a href="#lsof%e5%92%8cfuser" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h4><p><code>lsof</code>和<code>fuser</code>都可以查看文件是否正在使用，但有一定的局限性。比如文件<code>/tmp/my_unix_socket</code>的真实路径是<code>/private/tmp/my_unix_socket</code>，用<code>lsof</code>和<code>fuser</code>可以看出<code>/tmp/my_unix_socket</code>正在使用，但不能看出<code>/private/tmp/my_unix_socket</code>正在使用中，如下：</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span><span class="lnt">6
</span><span class="lnt">7
</span><span class="lnt">8
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">star@MacBook-Air: ~ $ lsof /tmp/my_unix_socket
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">COMMAND PID USER FD TYPE DEVICE SIZE/OFF NODE NAME
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">socket_un <span class="m">10413</span> star 3u unix 0x8c48f298d8f4ebca 0t0 /tmp/my_unix_socket
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">star@MacBook-Air: ~ $ lsof /private/tmp/my_unix_socket
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">star@MacBook-Air: ~ $ fuser /tmp/my_unix_socket
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">/tmp/my_unix_socket: <span class="m">10413</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">star@MacBook-Air: ~ $ fuser /private/tmp/my_unix_socket
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">/private/tmp/my_unix_socket: </span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h4 id="psutil" class="heading-element"><span>psutil</span>
 <a href="#psutil" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h4><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span><span class="lnt">6
</span><span class="lnt">7
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-python" data-lang="python"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">is_path_in_use</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">path</span><span class="p">):</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">proc</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">psutil</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">process_iter</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">attrs</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">&#34;pid&#34;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">&#34;name&#34;</span><span class="p">]):</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">try</span><span class="p">:</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">file</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">proc</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">open_files</span><span class="p">():</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">file</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">path</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="n">path</span><span class="p">:</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">return</span> <span class="kc">True</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">except</span> <span class="o">...</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>以<code>Google Chrome</code>进程为例，可以使用<code>lsof &quot;/Applications/Google Chrome.app/Contents/MacOS/Google Chrome&quot;</code>命令或者活动监视器APP来查看<code>PID</code>。运行<code>lsof -p PID</code>命令可看到结果有几百项，用<code>psutil</code>的<code>open_file()</code>函数可以获得一个包含文件的<code>FD</code>和<code>NAME</code>的列表，将<code>lsof</code>和<code>open_file()</code>的结果中<code>FD</code>和<code>NAME</code>一样的条目视为同一项，（<code>lsof</code>的<code>FD</code>可能会尾随一个字母，写程序对比结果时需注意）可以发现：</p>
<ul>
<li><code>ope_file()</code>函数获得的文件列表是<code>lsof</code>结果的真子集</li>
<li><code>lsof</code>命令的结果包含的列有<code>COMMAND,PID,USER,FD,TYPE,DEVICE,SIZE/OFF,NODE,NAME</code>，其中<code>TYPE</code>即为文件的类型。<code>open_file()</code>函数得到所有文件，参照<code>lsof</code>的结果，这些文件的类型都是<code>REG</code>，即普通文件，但并不包含<code>lsof</code>结果中的所有<code>REG</code>类型的文件。<a href="https://psutil.readthedocs.io/en/latest/#psutil.Process.open_files"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">open_file()</a>函数的官方文档的描述是<code>Return regular files opened by process as a list...</code>，这里提到的是<code>regular files</code>，而<code>lsof</code>也恰好显示<code>open_file()</code>所列文件的类型都是<code>REG</code>。</li>
</ul>
<h4 id="fcntl" class="heading-element"><span>fcntl</span>
 <a href="#fcntl" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h4><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span><span class="lnt">6
</span><span class="lnt">7
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-python" data-lang="python"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">is_path_in_use</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">path</span><span class="p">):</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">try</span><span class="p">:</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">with</span> <span class="nb">open</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">path</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">&#34;r&#34;</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="n">file</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="c1"># open 函数不支持打开 socket 等特殊类型的文件</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">fcntl</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">flock</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">file</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">fcntl</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">LOCK_EX</span> <span class="o">|</span> <span class="n">fcntl</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">LOCK_NB</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="c1"># 尝试获取独占锁</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">fcntl</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">flock</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">file</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">fcntl</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">LOCK_UN</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="c1"># 如果成功，释放锁</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">return</span> <span class="kc">False</span> <span class="c1"># 文件未被使用</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">except</span> <span class="o">...</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h4 id="不同方法对比" class="heading-element"><span>不同方法对比</span>
 <a href="#%e4%b8%8d%e5%90%8c%e6%96%b9%e6%b3%95%e5%af%b9%e6%af%94" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h4><p>下面是几种正在使用中的文件，不同方法判断出来的结果</p>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>正在使用中文件</th>
<th>lsof</th>
<th>psutil</th>
<th>fcntl</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>一个socket类型的文件，使用Unix域socket通信的进程运行时使用的就是该类文件</td>
<td>True</td>
<td>False</td>
<td>False</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>一个可执行文件</td>
<td>True</td>
<td>False</td>
<td>False</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>一个普通文件，正在用<code>Python</code>的<code>open</code>函数打开</td>
<td>True</td>
<td>True</td>
<td>False</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<h4 id="小结" class="heading-element"><span>小结</span>
 <a href="#%e5%b0%8f%e7%bb%93" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h4><p>用<code>Python</code>判断路径是否在使用中最好的方法是使用<code>lsof</code>命令:</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-python" data-lang="python"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">is_path_in_use</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">path</span><span class="p">):</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">return</span> <span class="n">os</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">popen</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="sa">f</span><span class="s2">&#34;lsof &#39;</span><span class="si">{</span><span class="n">path</span><span class="si">}</span><span class="s2">&#39;&#34;</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">read</span><span class="p">()</span> <span class="o">!=</span> <span class="s2">&#34;&#34;</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h3 id="xcode命令行工具" class="heading-element"><span>xcode命令行工具</span>

</div><h3 id="curl-7-failed-to-connect" class="heading-element"><span>curl: (7) Failed to connect</span>
 <a href="#curl-7-failed-to-connect" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-fallback" data-lang="fallback"><span class="line"><span class="cl">curl: (7) Failed to connect to raw.githubusercontent.com port 443 after 12 ms: Couldn&#39;t connect to server</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>出现该类问题，可以在<code>/etc/hosts</code>文件中添加对应域名的ip地址。例如<code>https://ip.chinaz.com/</code>等网站可以查询出域名<code>raw.githubusercontent.com</code>的IP地址其中一个是<code>185.199.110.133</code>，那么在<code>/etc/hosts</code>文件中添加以下内容即可</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-fallback" data-lang="fallback"><span class="line"><span class="cl">185.199.110.133 raw.githubusercontent.com</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h2 id="terminal-configuration" class="heading-element"><span>Terminal Configuration</span>
 <a href="#terminal-configuration" class="heading-mark">
