</h2><h3 id="设置主题" class="heading-element"><span>设置主题</span>
 <a href="#%e8%ae%be%e7%bd%ae%e4%b8%bb%e9%a2%98" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>新建一个主题</p>
<p>背景：<code>#300A24</code>,<code>#2C001E</code></p>
<p>字体：<code>Menlo Regular 13</code></p>
<p>文本：</p>
<ul>
<li>
<p><i class="fa-regular fa-check-square fa-fw" aria-hidden="true"></i> 使用粗体字</p>
</li>
<li>
<p><i class="fa-regular fa-check-square fa-fw" aria-hidden="true"></i> 允许闪动文本</p>
</li>
<li>
<p><i class="fa-regular fa-check-square fa-fw" aria-hidden="true"></i> 显示ANSI颜色</p>
</li>
<li>
<p><i class="fa-regular fa-check-square fa-fw" aria-hidden="true"></i> 对粗体文本使用亮丽颜色</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>文本：<code>#FFFFFF</code></p>
</li>
<li>
<p>粗体文本：<code>#FFFFFF</code></p>
</li>
<li>
<p>所选内容：<code>钨黑#424242</code></p>
</li>
</ul>
<p>光标：</p>
<ul>
<li><i class="fa-regular fa-check-square fa-fw" aria-hidden="true"></i> 竖条</li>
<li><i class="fa-regular fa-check-square fa-fw" aria-hidden="true"></i> 闪动光标</li>
</ul>
<p>ANSI颜色</p>
<ul>
<li>蓝色，标准：浅蓝色<code>#0096FF</code>，明亮：浅蓝色<code>#0096FF</code></li>
</ul>
<h3 id="zsh" class="heading-element"><span>zsh</span>
 <a href="#zsh" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>配置文件：<code>~/.zshrc</code></p>
<h4 id="修改不同类型文件的颜色" class="heading-element"><span>修改不同类型文件的颜色</span>
 <a href="#%e4%bf%ae%e6%94%b9%e4%b8%8d%e5%90%8c%e7%b1%bb%e5%9e%8b%e6%96%87%e4%bb%b6%e7%9a%84%e9%a2%9c%e8%89%b2" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h4><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nb">export</span> <span class="nv">LS_OPTIONS</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s2">&#34;--color=auto&#34;</span> <span class="c1"># 如果没有指定，则自动选择颜色</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nb">export</span> <span class="nv">CLICOLOR</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="m">1</span> <span class="c1">#是否输出颜色</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nb">export</span> <span class="nv">LSCOLORS</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s2">&#34;ExGxFxdaCxDaDahbadecex&#34;</span> <span class="c1">#指定颜色</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p><code>LSCOLORS</code> 变量由22个字母组成，每2个一组，分别代表一种文件类型的文字颜色和背景颜色。这11种文件类型分别为：</p>
<ul>
<li>directory（文件夹）</li>
<li>symbolic link（链接文件）</li>
<li>socket</li>
<li>pipe</li>
<li>executable（可执行文件）</li>
<li>block special</li>
<li>character special</li>
<li>executable with setuid bit set</li>
<li>executable with setgid bit set</li>
<li>directory writable to others, with sticky bit</li>
<li>directory writable to others, without sticky bit</li>
</ul>
<p>具体的颜色代码为：</p>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>A 粗体黑色</th>
<th>B 粗体红色</th>
<th>C 粗体绿色</th>
<th>D 粗体棕色</th>
<th>E 粗体蓝色</th>
<th>F 粗体洋红色</th>
<th>G 粗体青色</th>
<th>H 粗体浅灰色</th>
<th></th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>a 黑色</td>
<td>b 红色</td>
<td>c 绿色</td>
<td>d 棕色</td>
<td>e 蓝色</td>
<td>f 洋红色</td>
<td>g 青色</td>
<td>h 浅灰色</td>
<td>x 默认颜色</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<p>Mac上<code>LSCOLORS</code>默认值是<code>exfxcxdxbxegedabagacad</code>，参见：https://apple.stackexchange.com/questions/357353/lscolors-and-clicolor-active-by-default-and-unset</p>
<h4 id="修改提示符的颜色" class="heading-element"><span>修改提示符的颜色</span>
 <a href="#%e4%bf%ae%e6%94%b9%e6%8f%90%e7%a4%ba%e7%ac%a6%e7%9a%84%e9%a2%9c%e8%89%b2" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h4><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nb">export</span> <span class="nv">PROMPT</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s2">&#34;%F{green}%B%n@%m: %F{blue}%~ %f%b</span>$<span class="s2"> &#34;</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>重启终端，现在的效果：<strong><font color=green>star@MacBookPro: </font><font color=blue> ~/Downloads</font></strong> $</p>
<p><code>%n</code>：用户名，即<code>star@MacBookPro: ~/Downloads $</code> % 中的<code>star</code>部分；</p>
<p><code>%m</code>：电脑名称，即<code>star@MacBookPro: ~/Downloads $</code>中的<code>MacBookPro</code>部分；</p>
<p><code>%~</code>：当前文件夹路径名，<code>%~</code>会显示完整路径名，<code>%3~</code>则只会显示三层父级文件路径</p>
<p><code>%F{color}</code>：设置颜色，<code>color</code>可以是颜色名称，也可以是0~255区间的<a href="https://robotmoon.com/256-colors"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">数字</a>，对应<a href="https://www.ditig.com/publications/256-colors-cheat-sheet"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">shell中256配色表</a></p>
<p><code>%B</code>：粗体</p>
<p><code>%f</code>：恢复默认颜色</p>
<p><code>%b</code>：字体恢复正常宽度</p>
<p>另外<code>PROMPT</code>中<code>%n</code> <code>%m</code> <code>%~</code>的顺序及出现次数都可自行设置，删除亦可，<code>PROMPT</code>中可以自行修改和添加字符</p>
<p>参考：
<a href="https://blog.csdn.net/u010391437/article/details/75126310"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">macOS 修改终端Terminal的颜色设置</a>
<a href="https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/60880207"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">让MacOS的终端靓起来，给MacOS终端CLI添加颜色</a>
<a href="https://www.jianshu.com/p/dcf39bc7821a"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">自定义 zsh 提示（配置PROMPT或PS1）</a>
<a href="https://zsh.sourceforge.io/Doc/Release/Prompt-Expansion.html"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">Prompt Expansion</a>
<a href="https://prinsss.github.io/zsh-prompt-theme-customization/"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">教你写一个 Zsh 主题</a></p>
<h3 id="其它配置" class="heading-element"><span>其它配置</span>
 <a href="#%e5%85%b6%e5%ae%83%e9%85%8d%e7%bd%ae" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><h4 id="alias" class="heading-element"><span>alias</span>
 <a href="#alias" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h4><blockquote><p>shell built-in command</p>
</blockquote><p>可利用<code>alias</code>，自定义指令的别名。若仅输入<code>alias</code>，则可列出目前所有的别名设置。<code>alias</code>命令直接在命令行运行，效果仅生效于该终端窗口，若要每次打开终端都生效，可将命令写入<code>~/.zprofile</code>等文件中。示例</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nb">alias</span> <span class="nv">gcc</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">&#39;gcc-10&#39;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nb">alias</span> g++<span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">&#39;g++-10&#39;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nb">alias</span> ffmpeg-h<span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">&#39;ffmpeg -hide_banner&#39;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nb">alias</span> ffprobe-h<span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">&#39;ffprobe -hide_banner&#39;</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h2 id="terminal-command" class="heading-element"><span>Terminal Command</span>
 <a href="#terminal-command" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>参考：https://www.runoob.com/linux/linux-command-manual.html</p>
<h3 id="grep" class="heading-element"><span>grep</span>
 <a href="#grep" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span><span class="lnt">6
</span><span class="lnt">7
</span><span class="lnt">8
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-sh" data-lang="sh"><span class="line"><span class="cl">grep <span class="o">[</span>options<span class="o">]</span> pattern <span class="o">[</span>files<span class="o">]</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 多个条件，或</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">grep <span class="s2">&#34;word1\|word2&#34;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">grep -E <span class="s2">&#34;word1|word2&#34;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 多个条件，且。本质是运行两次grep命令，比如添加参数-n，后一个grep匹配的行号是基于第一个grep命令的结果</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">grep word1 <span class="p">|</span> grep word2
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 排除文件夹</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">grep --exclude-dir ~/Typora/Notes -rn 链接 ~/Typora</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><ul>
<li><code>-i</code>: 忽略大小写进行匹配</li>
<li><code>-v</code>: 反向查找，只打印不匹配的行</li>
<li><code>-n</code>: 显示匹配行的行号</li>
<li><code>-r</code>: 递归查找子目录中的文件</li>
<li><code>-l</code>: 只打印匹配的文件名</li>
<li><code>-c</code>: 只打印匹配的行数</li>
<li><code>-w</code> : 只显示全字符合的列</li>
<li><code>-E</code>: 正则表达式</li>
<li><code>--exclude-dir</code>: 排除文件夹</li>
</ul>
<h3 id="find" class="heading-element"><span>find</span>
 <a href="#find" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 当前文件夹下查找包含test的文件</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">find . -name <span class="s2">&#34;*test*&#34;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 在~路径下搜索，不在~/Library和~/.Trash中搜索。但搜索结果中会包含~/Library和~/.Trash这两项</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">find ~ -path ~/Library -prune -o -path ~/.Trash -prune -o -type f -name <span class="s2">&#34;.DS_Store&#34;</span> &gt; ~/Desktop/draft.txt</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p><code>-iname</code>: 忽略大小写</p>
<h3 id="ps" class="heading-element"><span>ps</span>
 <a href="#ps" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt"> 1
</span><span class="lnt"> 2
</span><span class="lnt"> 3
</span><span class="lnt"> 4
</span><span class="lnt"> 5
</span><span class="lnt"> 6
</span><span class="lnt"> 7
</span><span class="lnt"> 8
</span><span class="lnt"> 9
</span><span class="lnt">10
</span><span class="lnt">11
</span><span class="lnt">12
</span><span class="lnt">13
</span><span class="lnt">14
</span><span class="lnt">15
</span><span class="lnt">16
</span><span class="lnt">17
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">ps <span class="c1"># 默认只列出当前用户的由终端控制的进程</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">-a <span class="c1"># 其他用户的进程也会列出</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">-x <span class="c1"># 不由终端控制的进程也会列出</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">-A <span class="c1"># 其他用户的进程也会列出，包括由终端终止的进程</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">-e <span class="c1"># 等同于 -A</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">-f <span class="c1"># 会打印每个进程更多的信息</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">-o <span class="c1"># 指定输出格式</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">-u <span class="c1"># 只列出指定用户的进程</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">u <span class="c1"># 会打印每个进程更多的信息, UID以用户名的方式显示，而不是数字</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 组合用法举例</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">ps aux
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">ps -ef
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">ps -eo uid,pid,stat,command
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 对于 Mac, ps -aux 命令会报错, 在 Ubuntu 上 ps aux 与 ps -aux 都可以</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p><a href="https://www.runoob.com/linux/linux-comm-ps.html"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">https://www.runoob.com/linux/linux-comm-ps.html</a>
<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/programmer-tlh/p/11593330.html"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">https://www.cnblogs.com/programmer-tlh/p/11593330.html</a></p>
<h3 id="ioreg" class="heading-element"><span>ioreg</span>
 <a href="#ioreg" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>查询macbook pro电池的设计容量、当前可用容量、电池损耗情况、当前电量等信息：</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">ioreg -rn AppleSmartBattery <span class="p">|</span> grep -i capacity</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h3 id="diskutil" class="heading-element"><span>diskutil</span>
 <a href="#diskutil" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">diskutil list <span class="c1"># 查看所有磁盘信息</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">sudo diskutil umountDisk /dev/diskN <span class="c1"># 取消U盘挂载</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">sudo diskutil zeroDisk /dev/diskN <span class="c1"># 使用0覆盖所有扇区</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">sudo diskutil eraseDisk ExFAT ud /dev/disk3 <span class="c1"># 格式化为ExFAT格式的名叫ud的新U盘</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p><a href="https://blog.csdn.net/chenhao_c_h/article/details/102552874"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">https://blog.csdn.net/chenhao_c_h/article/details/102552874</a></p>
<h3 id="zipunzip" class="heading-element"><span>zip/unzip</span>
 <a href="#zipunzip" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">zip -rv test.zip test</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p><code>-r</code>: 递归处理。如果要压缩的是一个文件夹，没有加该参数则压缩的只是该文件夹中的文件，不包含子文件中的文件
<code>-v</code>: 显示压缩过程中的更详细的一些信息</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">unzip test.zip -d <span class="m">123</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">unzip -v test.zip</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p><code>-d</code>: 指定解压后的文件所在的目录
<code>-v</code>: 查看压缩包，不解压</p>
<h3 id="du" class="heading-element"><span>du</span>
 <a href="#du" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>查看文件夹或文件的大小</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">du -h -d <span class="m">1</span> .
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">du -sh <span class="c1"># 等效于 du -s -h</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p><code>-h</code>: 以<code>K\M\G</code>结尾显示文件大小
<code>-d</code>: 指定文件夹深度，默认显示该文件夹中所有子文件的大小
<code>-a</code>: 显示所有文件夹和文件的大小，默认只显示文件夹的大小
<code>-s</code>: 只显示文件夹总的大小，与<code>-d 0</code>效果一致</p>
<h3 id="ipcsipcrm" class="heading-element"><span>ipcs/ipcrm</span>
 <a href="#ipcsipcrm" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>查看/删除系统消息队列、共享内存、信号量等信息</p>
<h3 id="paste" class="heading-element"><span>paste</span>
 <a href="#paste" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>实现行对行的合并文件，效果如下</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt"> 1
</span><span class="lnt"> 2
</span><span class="lnt"> 3
</span><span class="lnt"> 4
</span><span class="lnt"> 5
</span><span class="lnt"> 6
</span><span class="lnt"> 7
</span><span class="lnt"> 8
</span><span class="lnt"> 9
</span><span class="lnt">10
</span><span class="lnt">11
</span><span class="lnt">12
</span><span class="lnt">13
</span><span class="lnt">14
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-sh" data-lang="sh"><span class="line"><span class="cl">star@MacBookAir: ~/Desktop $ cat file1.txt 
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">a
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">b
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">c
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">star@MacBookAir: ~/Desktop $ cat file2.txt 
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="m">1</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="m">2</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">star@MacBookAir: ~/Desktop $ paste -d , file1.txt file2.txt 
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">a,1
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">b,2
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">c
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">star@MacBookAir: ~/Desktop $ paste -s file1.txt file2.txt 
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">a	b	c
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">1	<span class="m">2</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p><code>-d</code>: 间隔字符，默认是<code>tab</code>键<code>\t</code></p>
<h3 id="cut" class="heading-element"><span>cut</span>
 <a href="#cut" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>提取文件每行指定内功，如下</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt"> 1
</span><span class="lnt"> 2
</span><span class="lnt"> 3
</span><span class="lnt"> 4
</span><span class="lnt"> 5
</span><span class="lnt"> 6
</span><span class="lnt"> 7
</span><span class="lnt"> 8
</span><span class="lnt"> 9
</span><span class="lnt">10
</span><span class="lnt">11
</span><span class="lnt">12
</span><span class="lnt">13
</span><span class="lnt">14
</span><span class="lnt">15
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">star@MacBookAir: ~/Desktop $ cat test.txt
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">2308:frame,1,30.000000,I
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">2769:frame,1,36.000000,I
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">star@MacBookAir: ~/Desktop $ cat test.txt <span class="p">|</span> cut -d , -f <span class="m">1</span> -f <span class="m">3</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">2308,30.000000
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">2769,36.000000
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">star@MacBookAir: ~/Desktop $ cat test.txt <span class="p">|</span> cut -d , -f -3 
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">2308:frame,1,30.000000
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">2769:frame,1,36.000000
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">star@MacBookAir: ~/Desktop $ cat test.txt <span class="p">|</span> cut -d , -f 3-
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">30.000000,I
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">36.000000,I
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">star@MacBookAir: ~/Desktop $ cat test.txt <span class="p">|</span> cut -d , -f 2,3
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">1,30.000000
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">1,36.000000</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">test.txt <span class="p">|</span> cut -c <span class="m">4</span> <span class="c1"># 第4个字符</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">test.txt <span class="p">|</span> cut -c -4 <span class="c1"># 前4个字符</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">test.txt <span class="p">|</span> cut -c 4- <span class="c1"># 第4个至最后一个字符</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">test.txt <span class="p">|</span> cut -c 4-10 <span class="c1"># 第4到第10个字符</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># -d参数同理</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p><code>-d,-f</code>: 两者需搭配使用，<code>-d</code>指定分割符，<code>-f</code>指定显示分割后哪几列
<code>-c</code>: 按字符进行提取
<code>-d</code>: 按字节进行提取</p>
<h3 id="inode相关" class="heading-element"><span>inode相关</span>
 <a href="#inode%e7%9b%b8%e5%85%b3" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><blockquote><p><code>ls -i</code>: 可以查看文件<code>inode</code>值和链接数</p>
<p><code>stat</code>: 查看文件<code>inode</code>内容</p>
</blockquote><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt"> 1
</span><span class="lnt"> 2
</span><span class="lnt"> 3
</span><span class="lnt"> 4
</span><span class="lnt"> 5
</span><span class="lnt"> 6
</span><span class="lnt"> 7
</span><span class="lnt"> 8
</span><span class="lnt"> 9
</span><span class="lnt">10
</span><span class="lnt">11
</span><span class="lnt">12
</span><span class="lnt">13
</span><span class="lnt">14
</span><span class="lnt">15
</span><span class="lnt">16
</span><span class="lnt">17
</span><span class="lnt">18
</span><span class="lnt">19
</span><span class="lnt">20
</span><span class="lnt">21
</span><span class="lnt">22
</span><span class="lnt">23
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">star@MacBook-Air: ~/Downloads/test $ ls -li
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">total <span class="m">24</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="m">4669683</span> -rw-r--r-- <span class="m">2</span> star staff <span class="m">6</span> <span class="m">4</span> <span class="m">27</span> 16:57 test-hard-link.txt
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="m">4670725</span> lrwxr-xr-x <span class="m">1</span> star staff <span class="m">10</span> <span class="m">4</span> <span class="m">27</span> 16:57 test-soft-link.txt -&gt; ./test.txt
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="m">4669683</span> -rw-r--r-- <span class="m">2</span> star staff <span class="m">6</span> <span class="m">4</span> <span class="m">27</span> 16:57 test.txt
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="m">4669461</span> -rw-r--r--@ <span class="m">1</span> star staff <span class="m">868</span> <span class="m">4</span> <span class="m">27</span> 16:51 test.txt的替身
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 分别表示: inode, 权限, 链接数</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">star@MacBook-Air: ~/Downloads/test $ stat test.txt 
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="m">16777234</span> <span class="m">4669683</span> -rw-r--r-- <span class="m">2</span> star staff <span class="m">0</span> <span class="m">6</span> <span class="s2">&#34;Apr 27 16:57:55 2024&#34;</span> <span class="s2">&#34;Apr 27 16:57:53 2024&#34;</span> <span class="s2">&#34;Apr 27 16:57:53 2024&#34;</span> <span class="s2">&#34;Apr 27 16:51:19 2024&#34;</span> <span class="m">4096</span> <span class="m">8</span> <span class="m">0</span> test.txt
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">star@MacBook-Air: ~/Downloads/test $ stat -s test.txt
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nv">st_dev</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="m">16777234</span> <span class="nv">st_ino</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="m">4669683</span> <span class="nv">st_mode</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="m">0100644</span> <span class="nv">st_nlink</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="m">2</span> <span class="nv">st_uid</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="m">501</span> <span class="nv">st_gid</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="m">20</span> <span class="nv">st_rdev</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="m">0</span> <span class="nv">st_size</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="m">6</span> <span class="nv">st_atime</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="m">1714208275</span> <span class="nv">st_mtime</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="m">1714208273</span> <span class="nv">st_ctime</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="m">1714208273</span> <span class="nv">st_birthtime</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="m">1714207879</span> <span class="nv">st_blksize</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="m">4096</span> <span class="nv">st_blocks</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="m">8</span> <span class="nv">st_flags</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="m">0</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">

</div><h3 id="chflags" class="heading-element"><span>chflags</span>
 <a href="#chflags" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 隐藏文件或目录</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">chflags hidden /path/to/your/file_or_directory
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 取消隐藏文件或目录</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">chflags nohidden /path/to/your/file_or_directory</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h3 id="lsof" class="heading-element"><span>lsof</span>
 <a href="#lsof" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">lsof -i:8080 <span class="c1"># 查看端口8080的使用情况</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">lsof -p PID <span class="c1"># 列出指定进程ID（PID）打开的文件</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">lsof /path/to/file <span class="c1"># 列出打开指定文件的进程</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">lsof -c <span class="s2">&#34;string&#34;</span> <span class="c1"># 列出包含指定字符串的进程打开的文件</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h3 id="xargs" class="heading-element"><span>xargs</span>
 <a href="#xargs" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span><span class="lnt">6
</span><span class="lnt">7
</span><span class="lnt">8
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 前一个命令的输出，作为后一个命令的输入，这时需要用到 xargs</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 对于前一个命令的输出结果，xargs 默认使用空格和换行符作为分隔符，分割后的各项作为后一个命令的输出</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">find . -name <span class="s2">&#34;*.md&#34;</span> <span class="p">|</span> xargs ls -l
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 例如 find 查找出来的各个结果中可能含有空格, 下面这个命令才能达到预期效果</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># -print0 表示使用各项分隔符是空字符(ASCII NUL character \0)而不是换行符</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># xargs -0 表示 xargs 将使用空字符\0作为分隔符</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># -print0 和 xargs -0 通常一起使用，如果不想空格被视作分隔符的话</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">find . -name <span class="s2">&#34;*.md&#34;</span> -print0 <span class="p">|</span> xargs -0 ls -l</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h3 id="envprintenv" class="heading-element"><span>env/printenv</span>
 <a href="#envprintenv" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span><span class="lnt">6
</span><span class="lnt">7
</span><span class="lnt">8
</span><span class="lnt">9
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 列出当前会话中所有的环境变量及其值</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">env
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 临时将VAR变量的值设置为value，然后执行command命令。</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">env <span class="nv">VAR</span><span class="o">=</span>value <span class="nb">command</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 列出当前会话中所有的环境变量及其值</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">printenv
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 只输出自定环境变量的值。</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">printenv PATH</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h2 id="python" class="heading-element"><span>Python</span>
 <a href="#python" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><h3 id="pypi" class="heading-element"><span>Pypi</span>
 <a href="#pypi" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><h4 id="基本使用" class="heading-element"><span>基本使用</span>
 <a href="#%e5%9f%ba%e6%9c%ac%e4%bd%bf%e7%94%a8" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h4><p>pip配置文件的路径：<code>~/.config/pip/pip.conf</code></p>
<p>清华pypi 镜像使用帮助：https://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/help/pypi/。临时使用：</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-sh" data-lang="sh"><span class="line"><span class="cl">pip install -i https://pypi.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/simple some-package</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>设置为默认源，执行下述命令：</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">pip config <span class="nb">set</span> global.index-url https://pypi.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/simple</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>该命令会在文件<code>~/.config/pip/pip.conf</code>中写入下述内容：</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-fallback" data-lang="fallback"><span class="line"><span class="cl">[global]
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">index-url = https://pypi.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/simple</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>常用命令</th>
<th></th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>pip install packageName1 packageName2</td>
<td></td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>pip install -r requirements.txt</td>
<td>将需安装的包写入一个txt文件，亦可同时安装多个包</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>pip uninstall packageName</td>
<td></td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>pip show packageName</td>
<td>显示包的信息</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>pip list</td>
<td></td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>pip list &ndash;outdated</td>
<td>可更新的包</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>pip install &ndash;upgrade packageName1 packageName2</td>
<td>更新包</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>pip freeze</td>
<td>列出安装的第三方库</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>pip show packageName</td>
<td>查看已安装包的信息</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<blockquote><p>删除所有第三方安装包，可用以下方法</p>
<p>pip freeze &gt; packages.txt
pip uninstall -r packages.txt -y</p>
<p>参数-y表示默认全部同意，不加该参数则每删除一个包都需要输入一次y</p>
</blockquote><h4 id="pip-autoremove" class="heading-element"><span>pip-autoremove</span>
 <a href="#pip-autoremove" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h4><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">pip install pip-autoremove</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>例如<code>pip unistall jupyter</code>命令只会删除<code>jupyter</code>这一个包；而<code>pip-autoremove jupyter</code>命令则可以删除<code>jupyter</code>相关的所有包，删除更彻底。</p>
<h4 id="pipdeptree" class="heading-element"><span>pipdeptree</span>
 <a href="#pipdeptree" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h4><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">pip install pipdeptree</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>用于查看已安装包之间的依赖关系</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt"> 1
</span><span class="lnt"> 2
</span><span class="lnt"> 3
</span><span class="lnt"> 4
</span><span class="lnt"> 5
</span><span class="lnt"> 6
</span><span class="lnt"> 7
</span><span class="lnt"> 8
</span><span class="lnt"> 9
</span><span class="lnt">10
</span><span class="lnt">11
</span><span class="lnt">12
</span><span class="lnt">13
</span><span class="lnt">14
</span><span class="lnt">15
</span><span class="lnt">16
</span><span class="lnt">17
</span><span class="lnt">18
</span><span class="lnt">19
</span><span class="lnt">20
</span><span class="lnt">21
</span><span class="lnt">22
</span><span class="lnt">23
</span><span class="lnt">24
</span><span class="lnt">25
</span><span class="lnt">26
</span><span class="lnt">27
</span><span class="lnt">28
</span><span class="lnt">29
</span><span class="lnt">30
</span><span class="lnt">31
</span><span class="lnt">32
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 以树状结构的形式列出所有已安装包之间的关系。会重复显示很多内容，比如A依赖B，B依赖一些包，C也依赖B，那么以B为根节点的这个子树既会显示在以A为根节点的这个树上，也会显示在以C为根节点的这个树上，也就是以B为根节点的这个子树会打印多遍，这样打印的结果非非常冗长，不方便查看</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">pipdeptree
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 打印的格式是 pip freeze 风格</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">pipdeptree -f
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">pipdeptree --freeze
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># -d 指定树的深度。-d 0 就是不被任何其他包所依赖的包。-d 1 与 pip show 显示的所依赖的包一致</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">pipdeptree -d <span class="m">0</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">pipdeptree -d <span class="m">1</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">pipdeptree -d <span class="m">1</span> -f
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># -p 指定某一个包</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">pipdeptree -p jupyter -d <span class="m">1</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># json 格式。与直接使用 pipdeptree 一样，会重复显示很多内容</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">pipdeptree --json-tree
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># json格式。显示每个已安装包的所依赖的包，不递归显示依赖的包依赖哪些包，相当于对 pip freeze 中的每个包进行 pip show 。区别于 pipdeptree -d 1，pipdeptree -d 1 是整个依赖树只显示深度为1的结果，所以某些已安装的包不会在输出结果中。</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">pipdeptree -j
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 反向显示依赖树，即显示每个包被哪些包所依赖</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">pipdeptree -r
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># pipdeptree 的根节点是每个不被任何其他包所依赖的包。pipdeptree -a 的根节点是每个已安装的包</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">pipdeptree -a
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 生成 mermaid 格式</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">pipdeptree --mermaid
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 可生成 svg 等格式。需安装 graphviz, pip install graphviz, brew install graphviz</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">pipdeptree --graph-output svg &gt; ~/Desktop/draft.svg</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h3 id="设置python默认版本" class="heading-element"><span>设置Python默认版本</span>
 <a href="#%e8%ae%be%e7%bd%aepython%e9%bb%98%e8%ae%a4%e7%89%88%e6%9c%ac" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>在Mac终端输入<code>python</code>，默认进入python2.7环境；现将python命令设置为其他版本</p>
<p>例在用brew安装好python@3.8后，在终端执行命令<code>brew info python@3.8</code>可看到以下信息：</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span><span class="lnt">6
</span><span class="lnt">7
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-mysql" data-lang="mysql"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="o">==&gt;</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">Caveats</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"></span><span class="n">Python</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">has</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">been</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">installed</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="k">as</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"></span><span class="o">/</span><span class="n">usr</span><span class="o">/</span><span class="n">local</span><span class="o">/</span><span class="n">bin</span><span class="o">/</span><span class="n">python3</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"></span><span class="n">Unversioned</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">symlinks</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="o">`</span><span class="n">python</span><span class="o">`</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="o">`</span><span class="n">python</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="n">config</span><span class="o">`</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="o">`</span><span class="n">pip</span><span class="o">`</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">etc</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">pointing</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="k">to</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"></span><span class="o">`</span><span class="n">python3</span><span class="o">`</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="o">`</span><span class="n">python3</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="n">config</span><span class="o">`</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="o">`</span><span class="n">pip3</span><span class="o">`</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">etc</span><span class="p">.,</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">respectively</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">have</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">been</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">installed</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="k">into</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"></span><span class="o">/</span><span class="n">usr</span><span class="o">/</span><span class="n">local</span><span class="o">/</span><span class="n">opt</span><span class="o">/</span><span class="n">python</span><span class="o">@</span><span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="mi">8</span><span class="o">/</span><span class="n">libexec</span><span class="o">/</span><span class="n">bin</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>关注上面的最后一行，将下述命令写入文件<code>~/.zprofile</code>即可：</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-gdscript3" data-lang="gdscript3"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">export</span> <span class="n">PATH</span><span class="o">=/</span><span class="n">usr</span><span class="o">/</span><span class="n">local</span><span class="o">/</span><span class="n">opt</span><span class="o">/</span><span class="n">python</span><span class="err">@</span><span class="mf">3.8</span><span class="o">/</span><span class="n">libexec</span><span class="o">/</span><span class="n">bin</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="o">$</span><span class="n">PATH</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>现在执行<code>which python</code>，即可得到下面结果：</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-fallback" data-lang="fallback"><span class="line"><span class="cl">/usr/local/opt/python@3.8/libexec/bin/python</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>本质上就是创建软链接，从输出信息可看出在文件夹<code>/usr/local/opt/python@3.8/libexec/bin</code>下已经创建好了对应的软链接，<code>export PATH=/usr/local/opt/python@3.8/libexec/bin:$PATH</code>使得该文件中加载的优先级更高，使得系统忽略了<code>/usr/bin</code>中的<code>python</code>命令(这是系统自带的Python2.7)</p>
<h3 id="使用虚拟环境" class="heading-element"><span>使用虚拟环境</span>
 <a href="#%e4%bd%bf%e7%94%a8%e8%99%9a%e6%8b%9f%e7%8e%af%e5%a2%83" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span><span class="lnt">6
</span><span class="lnt">7
</span><span class="lnt">8
</span><span class="lnt">9
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 创建虚拟环境</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">python -m venv ~/.venv/pytorch <span class="c1"># 最后一个参数是虚拟环境的路径；默认不会复制pip包到虚拟环境</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">python -m venv --system-site-packages ~/.venv/pytorch <span class="c1"># 会把系统安装的pip包复制到虚拟环境中</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 激活虚拟环境</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nb">source</span> ~/.venv/pytorch/bin/activate <span class="c1"># 即虚拟环境里bin文件夹下的activate</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 退出虚拟环境</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">deactivate</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>如上，可将虚拟环境放在一个隐藏文件夹下，避免无意被修改</p>
<p>虚拟环境的Python版本会与当前使用Python版本相同；如欲创建Python3.9的虚拟环境，在用brew安装好Python3.9后，用命令<code>python3.9 -m venv testvenv</code>创建的testvenv虚拟环境的Python版本就是3.9</p>
<p>对于多个Python版本，欲设置默认Python版本可参见<a href="#1.8-%e8%ae%be%e7%bd%aePython%e9%bb%98%e8%ae%a4%e7%89%88%e6%9c%ac">设置Python默认版本</a></p>
<p>激活虚拟环境的命令稍显复杂，参见<a href="#1.9-%e5%88%9b%e5%bb%baUnix%e5%8f%af%e6%89%a7%e8%a1%8c%e6%96%87%e4%bb%b6">创建Unix可执行文件</a>来实现快捷激活虚拟环境</p>
<blockquote><p>创建完Python虚拟环境<code>~/.venv/pytorch</code>后，可在<code>~/.venv/pytorch/bin</code>文件夹下看到两个软链接<code>python</code>和<code>python3</code>，它们的原身都是对应Python的安装路径，如用brew安装的Python:<code>/usr/local/Cellar/python@3.8/3.8.9/Frameworks/Python.framework/Versions/3.8/bin/python3.8</code>。这意味着如果以后用brew对Python3.8进行了升级，比如升级到了3.8.10版本，这两个软链接文件就失效了，需要重新创建软链接文件<code>python</code>和<code>python3</code>，使它们的原身指向更新后的python3.8路径。</p>
</blockquote><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span><span class="lnt">6
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">rm ~/.venv/pytorch/bin/python ~/.venv/pytorch/bin/python3
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">rm ~/.venv/tf2/bin/python ~/.venv/tf2/bin/python3
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">ln -s /usr/local/Cellar/python@3.8/3.8.12_1/Frameworks/Python.framework/Versions/3.8/bin/python3.8 ~/.venv/pytorch/bin/python
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">ln -s /usr/local/Cellar/python@3.8/3.8.12_1/Frameworks/Python.framework/Versions/3.8/bin/python3.8 ~/.venv/pytorch/bin/python3
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">ln -s /usr/local/Cellar/python@3.8/3.8.12_1/Frameworks/Python.framework/Versions/3.8/bin/python3.8 ~/.venv/tf2/bin/python
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">ln -s /usr/local/Cellar/python@3.8/3.8.12_1/Frameworks/Python.framework/Versions/3.8/bin/python3.8 ~/.venv/tf2/bin/python3</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h3 id="查看python包安装位置" class="heading-element"><span>查看python包安装位置</span>
 <a href="#%e6%9f%a5%e7%9c%8bpython%e5%8c%85%e5%ae%89%e8%a3%85%e4%bd%8d%e7%bd%ae" class="heading-mark">
