</h3><h4 id="书签导出和导入" class="heading-element"><span>书签导出和导入</span>
 <a href="#%e4%b9%a6%e7%ad%be%e5%af%bc%e5%87%ba%e5%92%8c%e5%af%bc%e5%85%a5" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h4><p>官网Blog：<a href="https://www.pdflabs.com/blog/export-and-import-pdf-bookmarks/"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">https://www.pdflabs.com/blog/export-and-import-pdf-bookmarks/</a></p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 导出书签</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">pdftk input.pdf dump_data output bookmark.txt
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 导入书签</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">pdftk input.pdf update_info bookmark.txt output output.pdf</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h4 id="合并pdf" class="heading-element"><span>合并PDF</span>
 <a href="#%e5%90%88%e5%b9%b6pdf" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h4><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">pdftk file1.pdf file2.pdf file3.pdf cat output merged.pdf
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 可使用通配符</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">pdftk *.pdf cat output combined.pdf</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h4 id="拆分pdf" class="heading-element"><span>拆分PDF</span>
 <a href="#%e6%8b%86%e5%88%86pdf" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h4><p>将PDF拆分成单独的页面文件</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">pdftk input.pdf burst
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 可指定输出文件名</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">pdftk input.pdf burst output page_%02d.pdf</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h4 id="提取pdf中的特定页面" class="heading-element"><span>提取PDF中的特定页面</span>
 <a href="#%e6%8f%90%e5%8f%96pdf%e4%b8%ad%e7%9a%84%e7%89%b9%e5%ae%9a%e9%a1%b5%e9%9d%a2" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h4><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 1-10页</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">pdftk original.pdf cat 1-10 output pages1-10.pdf
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 第1和第5页</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">pdftk input.pdf cat <span class="m">1</span> <span class="m">5</span> output extracted_pages.pdf</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h2 id="pdf书签管理" class="heading-element"><span>PDF书签管理</span>
 <a href="#pdf%e4%b9%a6%e7%ad%be%e7%ae%a1%e7%90%86" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>在豆瓣上可以搜到部分书的目录，将目录复制下来写成特定格式的文件就可以使用对应的工具导入书签</p>
<h3 id="pdftk-1" class="heading-element"><span>PDFtk</span>
 <a href="#pdftk-1" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><h3 id="pdf-bookmark" class="heading-element"><span>PDF-Bookmark</span>
 <a href="#pdf-bookmark" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>Github地址：https://github.com/xianghuzhao/pdf-bookmark</p>
<h3 id="adobe-acrobat" class="heading-element"><span>Adobe Acrobat</span>
 <a href="#adobe-acrobat" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>【页面缩略图】-【选项】-【页面标签】</p>
<h3 id="其他" class="heading-element"><span>其他</span>
 <a href="#%e5%85%b6%e4%bb%96" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>cpdf-binaries: <a href="https://github.com/coherentgraphics/cpdf-binaries"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">https://github.com/coherentgraphics/cpdf-binaries</a></p>
<h2 id="哔哩哔哩视频下载" class="heading-element"><span>哔哩哔哩视频下载</span>
 <a href="#%e5%93%94%e5%93%a9%e5%93%94%e5%93%a9%e8%a7%86%e9%a2%91%e4%b8%8b%e8%bd%bd" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><h3 id="哔哩哔哩mac客户端" class="heading-element"><span>哔哩哔哩MAC客户端</span>
 <a href="#%e5%93%94%e5%93%a9%e5%93%94%e5%93%a9mac%e5%ae%a2%e6%88%b7%e7%ab%af" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><ol>
<li>使用哔哩哔哩MAC客户端下载视频，会得到两个<code>m4s</code>文件</li>
<li>用文本编辑器打开这两个<code>m4s</code>文件，删除最前面的9个<code>30</code>，保存文件</li>
<li>将较大的那个<code>m4s</code>文件后缀改成<code>mp4</code>即得到视频文件（无声音），将较小的那个<code>m4s</code>文件后缀改成<code>mp3</code>即得到音频文件</li>
<li>最后合并<code>mp4</code>文件和<code>mp3</code>文件。用客户端下载视频可以得到原视频封面，可以进一步设置一下合成后的视频的封面</li>
</ol>
<h3 id="you-get-1" class="heading-element"><span>you-get</span>
 <a href="#you-get-1" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>但不能下载高清晰度的</p>
<h3 id="chrome插件" class="heading-element"><span>Chrome插件</span>
 <a href="#chrome%e6%8f%92%e4%bb%b6" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><ul>
<li>NeatDownloadManager：分别下载视频和音频文件，用<code>FFmpeg</code>可合并视频文件和音频文件为一个完整的视频</li>
<li>猫抓：选择视频文件和音频文件合并下载</li>
</ul>

item.title: Ubuntu Notes
item.author: 1469025384@qq.com (Hu Xin)
item.description:
<h2 id="相关说明" class="heading-element"><span>相关说明</span>
 <a href="#%e7%9b%b8%e5%85%b3%e8%af%b4%e6%98%8e" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>下述相关配置，无特别说明，使用的是<code>bash</code>终端</p>
<p>某些笔记是在Docker中的ubuntu中实践出来的，某些是双系统或虚拟机中实践出来的</p>
<h2 id="apt" class="heading-element"><span>apt</span>
 <a href="#apt" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p><code>apt</code>是对<code>apt-get</code>和<code>apt-cache</code>等工具的整合和改进，提供了更简洁和用户友好的接口。<code>apt</code>在一些操作上的输出更加简洁明了。</p>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>常用命令</th>
<th></th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>apt update</td>
<td></td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>apt upgrade</td>
<td>升级软件包</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>apt list &ndash;upgradeable</td>
<td>列出可更新的软件包及版本信息</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>apt install &lt;package_name&gt;</td>
<td>安装指定的软件命令</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>apt install &lt;package_1&gt; &lt;package_2&gt; &lt;package_3&gt;</td>
<td>安装多个软件包</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>apt update &lt;package_name&gt;</td>
<td>更新指定的软件命令</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>apt show &lt;package_name&gt;</td>
<td>显示软件包具体信息,例如:版本号，安装大小，依赖关系等等</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>apt remove &lt;package_name&gt;</td>
<td>删除软件包命令</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>apt autoremove</td>
<td>清理不再使用的依赖和库文件</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>apt purge &lt;package_name&gt;</td>
<td>移除软件包及配置文件</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>apt search &lt;key_word&gt;</td>
<td>查找软件包命令</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>apt list &ndash;installed</td>
<td>列出所有已安装的包</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>apt list &ndash;all-versions</td>
<td>列出所有已安装的包的版本信息</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<p>参考：https://www.runoob.com/linux/linux-comm-apt.html</p>
<h2 id="基础设置" class="heading-element"><span>基础设置</span>
 <a href="#%e5%9f%ba%e7%a1%80%e8%ae%be%e7%bd%ae" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span><span class="lnt">6
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">apt update
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">apt install build-essential <span class="c1"># 安装gcc等</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">apt install net-tools <span class="c1"># 会安装ifconfig</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">apt install iputils-ping <span class="c1"># 会安装ping</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">apt install vim gdb lsof
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">apt install python3 python3-pip</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h2 id="bash" class="heading-element"><span>bash</span>
 <a href="#bash" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>配置文件：<code>~/.bashrc</code></p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span><span class="lnt">6
</span><span class="lnt">7
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-sh" data-lang="sh"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># Set bash prompt</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nb">export</span> <span class="nv">PS1</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s2">&#34;\[\e[0m\n\]\[\e[1;38;5;214m\][\u@\H] \[\e[38;5;45m\]\s-\v \[\e[38;5;39m\]\w\[\e[0m\]\n\[\e[1;38;5;10m\]\$\[\e[0m\] &#34;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># Set GCC output color in order to highlight errors and warnings</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nb">export</span> <span class="nv">GCC_COLORS</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">&#39;error=01;38;5;196:warning=01;38;5;220:note=01;38;5;81:range1=38;5;47:range2=34:locus=01:\
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="s1">quote=01:fixit-insert=32:fixit-delete=31:\
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="s1">diff-filename=01:diff-hunk=32:diff-delete=31:diff-insert=32&#39;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nb">export</span> <span class="nv">LS_COLORS</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="nv">$LS_COLORS</span><span class="s1">&#39;:pi=33:bd=33;01:cd=33;01:or=31;01:su=37:sg=30:tw=30:ow=34:st=37&#39;</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h3 id="ls_colors" class="heading-element"><span>LS_COLORS</span>
 <a href="#ls_colors" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p><code>LS_COLORS</code>变量：设置<code>ls</code>命令在显示文件和目录时使用的颜色。</p>
<p><code>echo $LS_COLORS</code>查看当前<code>LS_COLORS</code>变量，以下ubunt中为<code>LS_COLORS</code>变量的默认配置。在<code>LS_COLORS</code>中，各项设置用冒号分割，每个设置都由十六进制数字组成，用分号分隔。</p>

class="p">:</span><span class="o">*.</span><span class="n">mp3</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">00</span><span class="p">;</span><span class="mi">36</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="o">*.</span><span class="n">mpc</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">00</span><span class="p">;</span><span class="mi">36</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="o">*.</span><span class="n">ogg</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">00</span><span class="p">;</span><span class="mi">36</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="o">*.</span><span class="n">ra</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">00</span><span class="p">;</span><span class="mi">36</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="o">*.</span><span class="n">wav</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">00</span><span class="p">;</span><span class="mi">36</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="o">*.</span><span class="n">oga</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">00</span><span class="p">;</span><span class="mi">36</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="o">*.</span><span class="n">opus</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">00</span><span class="p">;</span><span class="mi">36</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="o">*.</span><span class="n">spx</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">00</span><span class="p">;</span><span class="mi">36</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="o">*.</span><span class="n">xspf</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">00</span><span class="p">;</span><span class="mi">36</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="o">*~=</span><span class="mi">00</span><span class="p">;</span><span class="mi">90</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="o">*</span><span class="c1">#=00;90:*.bak=00;90:*.crdownload=00;90:*.dpkg-dist=00;90:*.dpkg-new=00;90:*.dpkg-old=00;90:*.dpkg-tmp=00;90:*.old=00;90:*.orig=00;90:*.part=00;90:*.rej=00;90:*.rpmnew=00;90:*.rpmorig=00;90:*.rpmsave=00;90:*.swp=00;90:*.tmp=00;90:*.ucf-dist=00;90:*.ucf-new=00;90:*.ucf-old=00;90:</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><blockquote><p>举例说明其含义</p>
<p><code>ow=34;42</code>: ow表示其他可写文件夹，34表示字体颜色是蓝色，42表示字体背景色是绿色</p>
<p><code>*.mp4=01;35</code>: <code>*.mp4</code>表示后缀为<code>.mp4</code>的文件，01表示粗体，35表示洋红色</p>
</blockquote><p><code>dircolors --print-database</code>命令查看默认的颜色设置，命令执行结果部分如下</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt"> 1
</span><span class="lnt"> 2
</span><span class="lnt"> 3
</span><span class="lnt"> 4
</span><span class="lnt"> 5
</span><span class="lnt"> 6
</span><span class="lnt"> 7
</span><span class="lnt"> 8
</span><span class="lnt"> 9
</span><span class="lnt">10
</span><span class="lnt">11
</span><span class="lnt">12
</span><span class="lnt">13
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-fallback" data-lang="fallback"><span class="line"><span class="cl"># ===================================================================
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"># Basic file attributes
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"># ===================================================================
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"># Below are the color init strings for the basic file types.
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"># One can use codes for 256 or more colors supported by modern terminals.
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"># The default color codes use the capabilities of an 8 color terminal
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"># with some additional attributes as per the following codes:
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"># Attribute codes:
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"># 00=none 01=bold 04=underscore 05=blink 07=reverse 08=concealed
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"># Text color codes:
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"># 30=black 31=red 32=green 33=yellow 34=blue 35=magenta 36=cyan 37=white
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"># Background color codes:
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"># 40=black 41=red 42=green 43=yellow 44=blue 45=magenta 46=cyan 47=white</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><blockquote><p>上述结果展示了部分数字对应的含义</p>
</blockquote><p><code>dircolors --print-ls-colors</code>命令展示已经被完全转义的颜色，命令执行结果部分如下</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-fallback" data-lang="fallback"><span class="line"><span class="cl">ow	34;42
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">ex	01;32
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">*.tar	01;31
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">*.tgz	01;31</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>部分变量的含义</p>
<ul>
<li><code>di</code>：表示目录（directory）的颜色。</li>
<li><code>fi</code>：表示普通文件（file）的颜色。</li>
<li><code>ex</code>：表示可执行文件（executable）的颜色。</li>
<li><code>ln</code>：表示符号链接（symbolic link）的颜色。</li>
<li><code>ow</code>：表示其他可写（Other Writable）件或目录的颜色。</li>
</ul>
<p>参考：<a href="https://blog.csdn.net/hooting/article/details/7625537"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">linux修改ls文件颜色-CSDN</a></p>
<h3 id="配置示例" class="heading-element"><span>配置示例</span>
 <a href="#%e9%85%8d%e7%bd%ae%e7%a4%ba%e4%be%8b" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nb">export</span> <span class="nv">LS_COLORS</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="nv">$LS_COLORS</span><span class="s1">&#39;:pi=33:bd=33;01:cd=33;01:or=31;01:su=37:sg=30:tw=30:ow=34:st=37&#39;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># export LS_COLORS=&#39;pi=33:bd=33;01:cd=33;01:or=31;01:su=37:sg=30:tw=30:ow=34:st=37:&#39;$LS_COLORS</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>在命令行<code>echo $LS_COLORS</code>可以查看<code>LS_COLORS</code>变量的值，以<code>:</code>分割，分割后对应各项设置。<code>$LS_COLORS':pi=33:bd=33;01:cd=33;01:or=31;01:su=37:sg=30:tw=30:ow=34:st=37'</code>即为<code>LS_COLORS</code>变量和字符串<code>:pi=33:bd=33;01:cd=33;01:or=31;01:su=37:sg=30:tw=30:ow=34:st=37</code>拼接后的结果。</p>
<p>配置完后，查看<code> LS_COLORS</code>变量<code>echo $LS_COLORS</code>，可以发现结果中有两个ow设置，因为默认的<code>LS_COLORS</code>变量中有设置ow，上述自定义的配置中又设置了ow。此时系统会采用后一个ow设置，因此想要自定义一个颜色设置，<code>$LS_COLORS</code>要写在自定义的字符串的前面。当然<code>export LS_COLORS='pi=33:bd=33;01:cd=33;01:or=31;01:su=37:sg=30:tw=30:ow=34:st=37'</code>也是可以的，但带上<code>$LS_COLORS</code>的好处是对于自己未指定的文件类型，会采用<code>$LS_COLORS</code>原始的设定。</p>
<p>在<code>LS_COLORS</code>变量的默认设置中，<code>pi,bd,cd,or,su,sg,tw,ow,st</code>这几个变量的设置如下</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-fallback" data-lang="fallback"><span class="line"><span class="cl">pi=40;33:bd=40;33;01:cd=40;33;01:or=40;31;01:su=37;41:sg=30;43:tw=30;42:ow=34;42:st=37;44
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"># 截取于echo $LS_COLORS</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>上述配置的作用实际就是去掉这几类文件的背景色，并保持文本颜色和默认一致</p>
<h2 id="查看系统相关信息" class="heading-element"><span>查看系统相关信息</span>
 <a href="#%e6%9f%a5%e7%9c%8b%e7%b3%bb%e7%bb%9f%e7%9b%b8%e5%85%b3%e4%bf%a1%e6%81%af" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>常用命令</th>
<th></th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>uname -a</td>
<td>可以查看系统相关信息</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>cat /proc/version</td>
<td>能显示内核版本等信息</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>hostname</td>
<td>查看主机名</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>lscpu</td>
<td>查看CPU信息</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>free -h</td>
<td>查看内存使用情况</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>df -h</td>
<td>查看磁盘空间使用情况</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>lsblk</td>
<td>查看块设备（磁盘等）信息</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>cat /etc/issue</td>
<td>查看发行版本</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<h2 id="中文支持" class="heading-element"><span>中文支持</span>
 <a href="#%e4%b8%ad%e6%96%87%e6%94%af%e6%8c%81" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 先安装中文支持包</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">apt install language-pack-zh-hans
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 再将下述添加到~/.bashrc</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nv">LANG</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s2">&#34;zh_CN.UTF-8&#34;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 配置完后，终端里可以显示中文</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p><a href="https://blog.csdn.net/a805607966/article/details/105874756"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">ubuntu 20.04中文输入法安装-CSDN</a></p>
<h2 id="调整apt源" class="heading-element"><span>调整apt源</span>
 <a href="#%e8%b0%83%e6%95%b4apt%e6%ba%90" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>Ubuntu 的软件源配置文件是 <code>/etc/apt/sources.list</code>，可先将系统自带的该文件做个备份</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">cp /etc/apt/sources.list /etc/apt/sources.list.backup</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>将该文件下的内容替换成清华源，然后更新源，</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">gedit /etc/apt/sources.list
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">apt update</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>清华源：<a href="https://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/help/ubuntu/"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">Ubuntu 镜像使用帮助</a></p>
<h3 id="ubuntu-2404-lts" class="heading-element"><span>Ubuntu 24.04 LTS</span>
 <a href="#ubuntu-2404-lts" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>在<code>Ubuntu 24.04 LTS</code>版本中，<code>/etc/apt/sources.list</code>文件的内容如下。</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">$ cat /etc/apt/sources.list
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># Ubuntu sources have moved to the /etc/apt/sources.list.d/ubuntu.sources</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># file, which uses the deb822 format. Use deb822-formatted .sources files</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># to manage package sources in the /etc/apt/sources.list.d/ directory.</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h2 id="linux-command" class="heading-element"><span>Linux Command</span>
 <a href="#linux-command" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><h3 id="netstat" class="heading-element"><span>netstat</span>
 <a href="#netstat" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>用于显示网络状态。https://www.runoob.com/linux/linux-comm-netstat.html</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">netstat -tunlp <span class="c1">#用于显示tcp,udp的端口和进程等相关情况</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><ul>
<li>-t或&ndash;tcp: 显示TCP传输协议的连线状况。</li>
<li>-u或&ndash;udp: 显示UDP传输协议的连线状况。</li>
<li>-n或&ndash;numeric: 直接使用IP地址，而不通过域名服务器。</li>
<li>-l或&ndash;listening: 显示监听中的服务器的Socket。</li>
<li>-p或&ndash;programs: 显示正在使用Socket的程序识别码和程序名称。</li>
</ul>
<h2 id="设置共享文件夹" class="heading-element"><span>设置共享文件夹</span>
 <a href="#%e8%ae%be%e7%bd%ae%e5%85%b1%e4%ba%ab%e6%96%87%e4%bb%b6%e5%a4%b9" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-fallback" data-lang="fallback"><span class="line"><span class="cl">环境
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">Ubuntu版本：Ubuntu 20.04.1 TLS
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">虚拟机：VMware Fusion 11/VMware Fusion 12</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><blockquote><p>可直接看最后一行</p>
</blockquote><p>在虚拟机软件里设置了共享文件夹，在Ubuntu中并不能直接看到，执行下述命令可查看共享的文件夹：</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">vmware-hgfsclient</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>在Ubuntu中访问共享文件夹，需要将共享目录挂到<code>/mnt/hgfs/</code>目录下，<code>/mnt/</code>目录下的<code>hgfs</code>可能需要自己手动创建，执行下述命令：</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">sudo vmhgfs-fuse .host:/ /mnt/hgfs/</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>之后在<code>/mnt/hgfs/</code>目录下就可以看到共享的文件夹，但需要管理员权限<code>sudo ls /mnt/hgfs/</code>，想要普通账户就可以访问该文件夹，对上述命令需要进行修改：</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">sudo vmhgfs-fuse .host:/ /mnt/hgfs -o <span class="nv">subtype</span><span class="o">=</span>vmhgfs-fuse,allow_other,nonempty </span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p><strong>简言之</strong>：执行最后一条命令即可，没有<code>hgfs</code>文件夹就手动创建；且每次开机都需要执行该命令，见<a href="#%e5%bc%80%e6%9c%ba%e6%89%a7%e8%a1%8c%e5%91%bd%e4%bb%a4">开机执行命令</a></p>
<p>参考：<a href="https://blog.csdn.net/qq_38196234/article/details/89568826"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">VMware Ubuntu18.10与Win10共享文件夹</a></p>
<h3 id="开机执行命令" class="heading-element"><span>开机执行命令</span>
 <a href="#%e5%bc%80%e6%9c%ba%e6%89%a7%e8%a1%8c%e5%91%bd%e4%bb%a4" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-fallback" data-lang="fallback"><span class="line"><span class="cl">环境
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">Ubuntu版本：Ubuntu 20.04.1 TLS
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">虚拟机：VMware Fusion 11/VMware Fusion 12</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>编辑文件<code>/etc/rc.local</code>，这是一个“只读”文件，需要用<code>sudo</code>权限来修改，执行命令：</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">sudo vim /etc/rc.local</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>在文件底部写入需要执行的命令，例如：</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="cp">#!/bin/bash
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="cp"></span>sudo vmhgfs-fuse .host:/ /mnt/hgfs -o <span class="nv">subtype</span><span class="o">=</span>vmhgfs-fuse,allow_other,nonempty </span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>保存后重启，如果命令没有如期执行，需要设置一下文件<code>/etc/rc.local</code>的权限，执行下述命令：</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">sudo chmod +x /etc/rc.local</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>参考：<a href="https://blog.csdn.net/qq292913477/article/details/81779787"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">Linux 开机执行命令</a></p>
<h3 id="其他问题" class="heading-element"><span>其他问题</span>
 <a href="#%e5%85%b6%e4%bb%96%e9%97%ae%e9%a2%98" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p><a href="https://blog.csdn.net/hautxuhaihu/article/details/78924926"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">Ubuntu16.04桌面突然卡住怎么办？</a></p>

item.title: My First Post
item.description: <p>A blog (a truncation of &ldquo;weblog&rdquo;) is an informational website published on the World Wide Web consisting of discrete, often informal diary-style text entries (posts). Posts are typically displayed in reverse chronological order so that the most recent post appears first, at the top of the web page. Until 2009, blogs were usually the work of a single individual,[citation needed] occasionally of a small group, and often covered a single subject or topic. In the 2010s, &ldquo;multi-author blogs&rdquo; (MABs) emerged, featuring the writing of multiple authors and sometimes professionally edited. MABs from newspapers, other media outlets, universities, think tanks, advocacy groups, and similar institutions account for an increasing quantity of blog traffic. The rise of Twitter and other &ldquo;microblogging&rdquo; systems helps integrate MABs and single-author blogs into the news media. Blog can also be used as a verb, meaning to maintain or add content to a blog.</p>
